info.description:
Quotel API offers a complete feature rich REST API access to all your quotes needs. This is the documentation of our quotes API.
To use it you first need to sign up here https://somethingsomethingdarkside.com to get an authentication api key.
info.title: quotes-api.

post.description: Get the authors by their ids

parameters.description: The structure of the request for getting authors by their ids
parameters.name: Body

apiKey.description: The api-key you use to access the api

ids.description: A list of the authors's ids that you want

post.description: Gets the author of the day

parameters.description: The structure of the request for getting the author / quote of the day
parameters.name: Body

apiKey.description: The api-key you use to access the api

language.description: Get the author / quote of the day for the given language ("icelandic" or "english")

post.description: Gets the history for the authors of the day

parameters.description: The structure of the request for getting the history of AODs / QODs
parameters.name: Body

apiKey.description: The api-key you use to access the api

language.description: Get the history of the AODS / QODs for the given language ("icelandic" or "english")

minimum.description: The earliest date to return. All authors / quotes between minimum and today will be returned.

post.description: sets the author of the day for the given dates

parameters.description: The structure of the request for setting AODs
parameters.name: Body

apiKey.description: The api-key you use to access the api

post.description: Get a list of authors according to some ordering / parameters

parameters.description: The structure of the request for getting a list of authors
parameters.name: Body

apiKey.description: The api-key you use to access the api

language.description:
Only return authors that have quotes in the given language ("english" or "icelandic") if left empty then no constraint
is set on the quotes' language. Note if ordering by nrOfQuotes if this parameter is set then only the amount of
quotes the author has in the given language counts towards the final ordering.

page.description: Response is paged. This parameter controls the page you are asking for, starts with 0.

pageSize.description: Response is paged. This parameter controls the number of Authors to be returned on each "page"

post.description: Get a random Author, and some of his quotes, according to the given parameters

parameters.description: The structure of the request for getting a random author
parameters.name: Body

apiKey.description: The api-key you use to access the api

language.description:
The random author must have quotes in the given language ("english" or "icelandic") if left empty then no
constraint on language is set

maxQuotes.description: How many quotes, maximum, to be returned from this author

get.description: Get languages supported by the api

parameters.description:
The structure of the request to get quotes. There are two ways to use this route. 1. Send the ids of the quotes to be
retrieved or 2. send the id of the author of the quotes you want (if you use this option the quotes are paginated)
parameters.name: Body

apiKey.description: The api-key you use to access the api

authorId.description: The id of the author of the quotes you want.

ids.description: The list of quotes's ids you want

page.description: If using authorId the response is paged. This parameter controls the page you are asking for, starts with 0.

pageSize.description: If using authorId the response is paged. This parameter controls the number of Authors to be returned on each "page"

post.description: Get list of quotes according to some ordering / parameters

parameters.description: The structure of the request for getting a list of quotes
parameters.name: Body

apiKey.description: The api-key you use to access the api

language.description:
Only return quotes that have quotes in the given language ("english" or "icelandic") if left empty then no constraint
is set on the quotes' language.

page.description: Response is paged. This parameter controls the page you are asking for, starts with 0.

pageSize.description: Response is paged. This parameter controls the number of Quotes to be returned on each "page"

post.description: gets the quote of the day

parameters.description: The structure of the request for getting the author / quote of the day
parameters.name: Body

apiKey.description: The api-key you use to access the api

language.description: Get the author / quote of the day for the given language ("icelandic" or "english")

post.description: Gets the history for the quotes of the day

parameters.description: The structure of the request for getting the history of AODs / QODs
parameters.name: Body

apiKey.description: The api-key you use to access the api

language.description: Get the history of the AODS / QODs for the given language ("icelandic" or "english")

minimum.description: The earliest date to return. All authors / quotes between minimum and today will be returned.

post.description: Sets the quote of the day for the given dates

parameters.description: The structure of the request for setting the QOD
parameters.name: Body

apiKey.description: The api-key you use to access the api

post.description: Get a random quote according to the given parameters

parameters.description: The structure of the request for a random quote
parameters.name: Body

apiKey.description: The api-key you use to access the api

authorId.description: The random quote returned must be from the author with the given authorId

language.description: The random quote returned must be in the given language

searchString.description: The random quote returned must contain a match with the searchstring

topicId.description: The random quote returned must be a part of the topic with the given topicId

post.description: Search for quotes / authors by a general string-search that searches both in the names of the authors and the quotes themselves

parameters.description: The structure of the request for searching quotes/authors
parameters.name: Body

apiKey.description: The api-key you use to access the api

language.description: The particular language that the quote should be in

page.description: The page you are asking for, starts with 0.

pageSize.description: The number of quotes to be returned on each "page"

searchString.description: The string to be used in the search

topicId.description: Should search in the specified topic for the searchString

post.description: Authors search. Searching authors by a given search string

parameters.description: The structure of the request for searching quotes/authors
parameters.name: Body

apiKey.description: The api-key you use to access the api

language.description: The particular language that the quote should be in

page.description: The page you are asking for, starts with 0.

pageSize.description: The number of quotes to be returned on each "page"

searchString.description: The string to be used in the search

post.description: Quotes search. Searching quotes by a given search string

parameters.description: The structure of the request for searching quotes/authors
parameters.name: Body

apiKey.description: The api-key you use to access the api

language.description: The particular language that the quote should be in

page.description: The page you are asking for, starts with 0.

pageSize.description: The number of quotes to be returned on each "page"

searchString.description: The string to be used in the search

topicId.description: Should search in the specified topic for the searchString

post.description: Get quotes from a particular topic

parameters.description: The structure of the request for listing topics
parameters.name: Body

apiKey.description: The api-key you use to access the api

id.description: The topic's id, if left empty then the topic name is used

page.description: The page you are asking for, starts with 0.

pageSize.description: The number of quotes to be returned on each "page"

topic.description: Name of the topic, if left empty then the id is used

post.description: List the available topics, english / icelandic or both

parameters.description: The structure of the request for listing topics
parameters.name: Body

language.description: The language of the topics. If left empty all topics from all languages are returned

post.description: Login to get the apiKey for the user

parameters.description: The structure of the Login request
parameters.name: Body

email.description: The email for the user you want to login

post.description: Create A user to get a free ApiKey

parameters.description: The structure of the sign up request
parameters.name: Body

email.description: The email for the created user (used for validation and password retrieval)

password.description: The password for the user, used to get the ApiKey and look at stats (coming soon). Must be a relatively strong pass

passwordConfirmation.description: The confirmation for the password. Must be same as "password"

date.description: The date when this author was the author of the day

count.description: The popularity index of the author

hasIcelandicQuotes.description: Whether or not this author has some icelandic quotes

nrOfEnglishQuotes.description: How many quotes in English this author has

nrOfIcelandicQuotes.description: How many quotes in Icelandic this author has

date.description: The date when this author / quote should be 'of the day'

id.description: The id of the author / quote

language.description: The language of this author / quote

maximum.description:
Where to end the ordering (if empty it ends at the logical end, for example end at the highest quoteid for quoteid ascending order).
Note this key is always a string.

minimum.description:
Where to start the ordering (if empty it starts from beginning, for example start at 1 for quoteid ascending order).
Note this key is always a string.

reverse.description: Whether to order the list in reverse or not (true is Descending and false is Ascending, false is default)

date.description: The date when this quote was the quote of the day

isIcelandic.description:
Whether the quote is in icelandic
false

quote.example: Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee

isIcelandic.description: Whether or not this quote is in Icelandic or not

quote.example: Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee.

isIcelandi.description: Whether or not this quote is in Icelandic or not

quote.example: Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee.

topicId.description: The topic's id (if topic id / name not supplied this will return a zero id)

topicName.description: The topic's name (if topic id / name not supplied this will return empty string "")

apiKey.description: The api-key that the user should send to get access to the api

date.description: The date when this author was the author of the day

isicelandic.description: Whether the quote is in icelandic

quote.example: Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee

isicelandic.description: Whether or not this quote is in Icelandic or not

quote.example: Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee.

aodHistoryResponse.description: Data structure representing the response for the history of AODs

aodResponse.description: Data structure representing the response for the author of the day

authorsResponse.description: Data structure representing the response for authors

incorrectBodyStructureResponse.description: Data structure representing the error response to a wrongly structured request body

message.example: request body is not structured correctly.

incorrectCredentialsResponse.description: Data structure representing the error response to an incorrect Credentials error

internalServerErrorResponse.description: Data structure representing the error response to an internal server error

listOfStrings.description: Data structure for supported languages information

notFoundResponse.description: Data structure representing the error response to a not found error

message.example: No quote exists that matches the given parameters.

qodHistoryResponse.description: Data structure representing the response for the history of QODS

qodResponse.description: Data structure representing the response for the quote of the day

searchViewResponse.description: Data structure representing the response for a quote

searchViewsResponse.description: Data structure representing the response for quotes

topicViewResponse.description: Data structure representing the response for a quote based on a particular topic

topicViewsResponse.description: Data structure representing the response for a quote based on a particular topic

topicsResponse.description: Data structure representing a list response for topics

userResponse.description: Data structure representing a user response

apikey.description: To use the api you need an API key. The basic API key lets you make up to 100 requests an hour.
apikey.name: apiKey

tags.description: Using text search for finding authors and quotes.
tags.name: SEARCH

tags.description: Access all authors. Use this to get/explore authors, get a random author or see the Author of the day.
tags.name: AUTHORS
